item.title: Home
item.description: AleWand is a brewing application currently in development which makes use of the BJCP 2015 style guide and contains many malts & hops as standard. Recipe design is split into several steps, making it easy to design your recipe, through the Mash, Boil and Fermentation. The following video depicts a simple example of recipe design (there are plenty of refinements to the graphical interface I am currently planning!)

item.title: About
item.description: “Alewives would put out a sign - a hop pole or ale-wand - to show when their beer was ready.” - Wikipedia AleWand is a brewing app, to facilitate the easy creation of beer recipes. It makes use of JSON to store the recipe for ease of parsing by other applications. It makes use of the 2015 BJCP style guide to help your recipe meet IBUs/alcohol content for a style.
